Dialogue: Anytime you think I'm being to tough, anytime you think I'm being unfair... QUIT ! Grab your gear and take a stroll down "Washout Lane". Get me ?

Dialogue: I wonder if there's a handful of guts in the whole bunch. Who thinks they've got what it takes to knock me down ?

Dialogue: Sir, I guess maybe I do, sir.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: You alright, Breckinridge ?

Dialogue: Sir, yes, sir. It's my arm. I think it's broken, sir.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: MEDIC !

Dialogue: Clean break... Doc'll have him back on active duty by tomorrow.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Good. Who's next ?

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: He's good alright.

Speaker: katrina
Dialogue: I'll bet he makes squad leader.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: He'll have to get past me.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: MEDIC !

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: WHY IS THAT WEAPON ON THE GROUND ? YOUR WEAPON IS MORE IMPORTANT THAN YOU ARE ! PICK IT UP ! PICK IT UP !

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Is that all you got ? You hit like kitten, Smith ! This is a punch.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Sir, I don't understands who needs a knife in a nuke fight anyway... All you gotta do is push a button, sir !

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Put your hand on the post, private.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: AWK !

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: The enemy cannot push a button if you disable his hand. MEDIC !

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: Sir, recruit Flores, reporting for duty , sir.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: I see you specifically requested transfer from Fort Cronkite to this training group...

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: Sir, I heard it was the best, sir !

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: It is the best... BUT WHAT MAKES YOU THINK YOU'RE GOOD ENOUGH ? ON YOUR BELLY AND GIVE ME FIFTY, RECRUIT !

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: I'd like to disable Zim...!

Speaker: katrina
Dialogue: Improper Attitude ! They'll kick you out for talking like that...

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: Off you go down Washout Lane, bye-bye !

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Aw, you either got what it takes or you don't.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: At ease, soldier. It's all the same muck.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Better get in line like everyone else, Ace.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: You got some guts for a rich kid. I guess you and me could be buddies.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: What an honor...

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Hey, don't laugh. Everyone oughta have a friend like me !

Speaker: breckinridge
Dialogue: Come on, Ace, back off the line ! Bacl off the line !

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: Hey, amigo, come chow with me.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: No thanks, Diz.

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: What's your malfunction, Rico ?

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: You are. I joined up to get out on my own. And you had to tag along.

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: What ? You think I joined the Mobile Infantery because of you ?

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: You saying you didn't ?

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: What makes you think... you'll make... squad leader, Rico ?

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Something... I've got...you don't.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: You rich kids... are all the same !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: It isn't about rich... It's about who's best...!

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: Coming through !

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: C'mon, move it, you apes !

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: We all have one thing in common. We were all stupid enough to sign up for Mobile Infanterie. What's your excuse, Breckinridge ?

Speaker: breckinridge
Dialogue: Well, my family is all farmers. I hate farming. Mobile Infantery's pure picnic by comparison.

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: So the grow 'em big and dumb on the farm planet, eh ?    Djana'd ?

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: C'mon, keep it going... Katrina !

Speaker: katrina
Dialogue: I wanna be a mom. It's easier to get a licence if you've served.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: I'm going career... officer's training. That's why I wanna be squad leader. They look for that.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Wanting it doesn't make you the best one for the job.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Oh, yeah ? I don't see anyone else here with the chops to lead.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Well, maybe you better look again.

Speaker: shujumi
Dialogue: Federation's gonna give me a scholarship when my hitch is up. I wanna be a neurologist, study brain chemisty and associated stimulus...

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: Your turn, Rico !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Aw, who asked you to be so nosey ?

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: Me, I got plans to be writer, and a writer's got a right to be nosey. Flores, you know Rico from Buenos Aires... What's his story ?

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: Well, some say he turned his back on the family fortune to be a citizen, others say he did it for a girl... missed a spot there, bucko... which is funny because Johnny says I joined up to be with him, but why would I do that ? He doesn't even like me.

Speaker: breckinridge
Dialogue: Don't look that way to me.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: I know it's not much, but it's home. Over there's my bunk where I dream about you every night...

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Hey, do you mind ?

Speaker: katrina
Dialogue: Hey, what's going on ?

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: I bet it's that girl I was talking about... Her name's Carmen, I think.

Speaker: katrina
Dialogue: Hi, Carmen !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Boot's pretty tough, and sometimes I think I won't make it, but then I imagine you're watching me, and that gives me someting... I try harder. Thanks to you, I think I might have a shot at squad leader.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Uh-oh, I gotta pack it in. I hope you're having fun, hope you're careful. No training accidents for you, eh ?  I want to kiss you so badly. I want to feel you next to me, I-

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: I love you truly, so truly, dear...!

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Our love will grow, dear, year by year...

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Bye ! Write me ! I'm gonna kill you guys !

Speaker: bald cadet
Dialogue: Orbit in five, Ibanez ! First one there gets to fly !

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Looking it down !

Speaker: late cadet
Dialogue: Oh no, not Ibanez again, she's crazy !

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: On my mark, in three, two, one...

Speaker: bald cadet
Dialogue: Geez, I thought I liked to fly fast !

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: This is nothing. Today, I get to fly that !

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Pilot Trainee Ibanez reporting for duty, ma'am.

Speaker: deladier
Dialogue: Take the number one chair, Ibanez. Follow all instructions of you supervisor.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Yes, ma'am !

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Hey ! What are you doing here ?

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: I'm the guy who's gonna teach you to fly this crate.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Assistant insructor... You must be some kind of a hot stick. Should I call you "sir" ?

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Only when I give you an order.

Speaker: deladier
Dialogue: Prepare for departure.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: It's amazing, us running into each other like this. Maybe it's fate.

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Maybe not. I heard about this crazy girl coming through the academy, solid math, a little wild on the stick, but a natural. When it turned out it was you, I made sure we'd run into each other...

Speaker: deladier
Dialogue: Alright, take her out, Ibanez.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Yes, ma'am.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: In simulation, my supervisors could never keep up.

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: This isn't simulation anymore. Take'er out easy, cadet.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Oh, yes, sir. Vector ?

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Twenty-five by five, roll seven. And don't exceed port speed.

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: They revoke our flight status.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Oh, I see... teamwork.

Speaker: deladier
Dialogue: Steady as she goes, number one. Prepare for warp. Number two, design for Jupiter orbit.

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Yes, ma'am. Star drive in three... two... one...

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: The object of this exercise is to capture your enemy's flag before your enemy captures yours.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: These weapons have been modified for this exercise. If your enemy hits you, your suit will fail. You will be unable to move. You will be as good as dead.

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: You are now prisoners of the Blue Team. Tell us your plans or die !

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: I'm going in ! Let's go !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Man, they're defended... no way in.

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: Flip six, three hole.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: What ?

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: High school... remember ? Run a flip six, three hole play, and you might score...

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Cover me.

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: You got it.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Thanks, pal.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Kid's got some moves...

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Smith, GO ! McIntire, GO ! Flores, GO ! Rico, I'm making you sqaud leader !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Sir, thank you, sir !

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Don't stand there dumb... GO !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: YEEEE-Haaaaaaaaaaaaa...!

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: Look at him. Do you think anyone has ever been so pleased with himself ?

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Zim hadda choose someone to be his brown nose, I guess.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: I just want you guys to know that I'll never do anything that I haven't asked you to do first.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Couldn't've done it without you, Diz. Friends ?

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: Yeah, sure... friends.

Speaker: bronski
Dialogue: Levy... Shujumi... Rico.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Bet it's from my girl.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Hi, Johnny, I would've written sooner, but they've really got us going every moment here.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Yeow, Rico, you don't deserve that !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Shhhh...!

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: I'm glad you're doing so well. If they haven't made you squad leader by now, I'm sure you will.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: All it takes is the love of a good woman...

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Look at that. Isn't it beautiful ? I had to show you. It's great to be out here on my own. I'm just not some little girl from Buenos Aires anymore. I'm gonna be a starship pilot, and I'm gonna see the universe...  And that's also the problem because I don't really want to get married, Johnny. I don't want to have kids. I want a command, a ship of my own, and you know, I don't think that's gonna leave a lot of room for you and me.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: I know that's not what you wanted to hear... but I have to follow my heart. I'm sorry. I'm afraid you'll hate me, and I couldn't stand that. Write me, alright ? Write me, so I'll know that we'll always be friends.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Funny how they always want to be your friends after they kick your guts out.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: It's what I deserve.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Whad'ya talkin  about ?

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: I joined up for her. I wouldn't even be here if it wasn't for her. I'm a fool.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: You made squad leader on your own, and, hey, you still got me to kick around.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Thanks, Ace.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: With the Marauder's visual capabilities, all you have to do is look at something to hit it, so you will exercise EXTREME CARE on my firing line. Do you get me ?

Speaker: recruits
Dialogue: Sir, yes, sir !

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: The live firing combat range is the closest simulation of actual combat we can provide. If you do not hit your target, it will shoot you...

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: The Marauder power suit will prevent serious injury, but if you are hit, you will be non-operational and your team score will suffer accordingly. Rico, has each member of your squad completed a weapons safety check ?

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Sir, yes, sir !

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Perfect score for this exercise is 300. B company came through last week

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: CROSSFIRE ! EVERYBODY DOWN !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Alright, no more screw ups. Ace takes point. Diz, you and Kitten Smith cover the flanks. Djana'd, you're rear guard. Move out.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: What's the problem ?

Speaker: breckinridge
Dialogue: Dunno. Display's fritzed.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Let me see.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Oh, God... uh... MEDIC !

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Rico, you are relieved of squad command. Levy, McIntire you will escort private Rico to the C.O.'s Office.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Sir, yes, sir. Breckinridge reported a helmet malfunction, and I asked him to show it to me, sir.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Sir, no, sir.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Sir, I needed everyone in my squad operational, sir... I... I wanted to win, sir.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Sir, no, sir !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Sir... I guess I do, sir.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Alright, let's go, Rico.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Bite on this. It helps. I know.

Speaker: bronski
Dialogue: One.

Speaker: bronski
Dialogue: Two.

Speaker: bronski
Dialogue: Three.

Speaker: bronski
Dialogue: Four.

Speaker: bronski
Dialogue: Five.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Thanks. You read my mind. Third watch always seems to last forever.

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Oh, I don't know... Depends on who you are spending it with.

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Profile's wrong... there.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: No, I replotted the course. It's more efficient this way.

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Three weeks aboard a starship and you know it all, huh ?

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Hey, check it.

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: You know I was talking to Captain, Deladier, and she said...

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Don't change the subject. Am I right ?

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Well, whad'ya know...

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Don't mess with the boss. So what'd the captain say ?

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: She got a command... and she thinks we oughta team up officially and crew for her. She thinks we're good together.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: You and me, huh ?

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: I have a feeling about us. We're good together, way ahead of the curve in every department. I seem to be able to anticipate your needs. You know what I want...

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: No, what do you want ?

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: I want to be part of the best flight team in the Fleet...

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Me, too... Day and Night-Cycle.

Speaker: deladier
Dialogue: Report.

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Captain, we are in the path of an unidentified object moving at near light speed...

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: WHERE IS IT ?

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: THERE !    GRAVITY FIELD... IT'S BIG !

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: It looks like an... asteroid.

Speaker: deladier
Dialogue: In this part of the system ?

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Sweet Jesus...!

Speaker: deladier
Dialogue: Where'd it come from ?

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Trajectory indicates it came out of the Arachnid Quarantine Zone.

Speaker: deladier
Dialogue: Number 4, contact Fleet and tell 'em there's a loose asteroid headed their way.

Speaker: communications officer
Dialogue: Communications are down, ma'am.

Speaker: deladier
Dialogue: Engineering. Damage assessment.

Speaker: engineering officer
Dialogue: Hull's compromised. We're lucky to be alive, ma'am.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Thank you, ma'am.

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: It stinks, you goin.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: I don't stay where I'm not wanted.

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: If they didn't want you, they woulda kicked you out, amigo.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Hey, they humiliated me in front of everyone ! I'm just supposed to take it, huh ? Well, I'm not gonna, and I guess that proves I just can't cut it.

Speaker: bronski
Dialogue: Your call's going through, Rico. Take it there.

Speaker: mother
Dialogue: Hello... Oh, Johnny...!

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Hi, mom.

Speaker: mother
Dialogue: Bill... pick up... it's Johnny ! You little rat. You haven't called, you haven't written. It's been so lonely here without you...

Speaker: father
Dialogue: Johnny ! Where's your uniform...?

Speaker: father
Dialogue: Well, it's just good to hear from you. What's up, son ?

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: It's not really working out for me here, dad. I was thinking... I was hoping it would be alright if I came home.

Speaker: mother
Dialogue: Well, of course you should come home immedietly !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: I've made a mess of things. I've been so stupid...

Speaker: father
Dialogue: Don't talk like that. Get yourself home as fast as you can.

Speaker: mother
Dialogue: We'll all have dinner. I'll fix your favorite.

Speaker: father
Dialogue: Yeah ! We'll talk it out and have a good glass of wine ... and... well, we love you, son.

Speaker: mother
Dialogue: Oh, my, what's that ?

Speaker: father
Dialogue: Looks like rain.

Speaker: mother
Dialogue: This time of the year...?

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Well, see ya.

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: You take the stroll down Washout Lane, you're only proving one thing, Johnny.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: What's that, Diz ?

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: That you don't have what it takes to be acitizen !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Hey, Kitten, what's going on ?

Speaker: kitten
Dialogue: It's war !

Speaker: official voice
Dialogue: ... early estimates. Millions dead, a city in ruins...

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Oh, jeez, is that Geneva ?

Speaker: katrina
Dialogue: Goddam bugs whacked us, Johnny.

Speaker: official voice
Dialogue: ... Buenos Aires has been wiped of the Earth. Nothing lives in what was once called the Latin Paradise...

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: Aw, Johnny, geez... It's home.

Speaker: official voice
Dialogue: The Federal Court met moments ago and voted unanimously for mobilization to destroy the Arachnid threat.

Speaker: official voice
Dialogue: The meteor derived from here, near Klendathu, in the Arachnid's home system...

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: I'm serious, sir. I'll go anywhere. I want combat.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Yes, sir, I get you.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Sir, I wish to reconsider my request to drop out, sir.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Sir, i know it was wrong. I didn't learn from one mistake and I made another, sir.  Sir, my family... my whole family was in Buenos Aires, sir.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Is that your signature, Rico ?

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Sir, yes it is, sir.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Doesn't look like it to me.

Speaker: zim
Dialogue: Get outa here, private.

Speaker: official voice
Dialogue: Out of the ashes of Buenos Aires comes first sorrow, then ANGER !

Speaker: angry person
Dialogue: The only good bug is a dead bug !

Speaker: official voice
Dialogue: Would you like to know more ?

Speaker: official voice
Dialogue: Cap Troopers establish a foothold on Dantana, a planet system at the outer edge of the Arachnid Quarantine Zone. Casualties are high, but casualties won't stop the Mobile Infantery ! Would you like to know more ?

Speaker: official voice
Dialogue: Everyone's doing their share. Are you ? The war effort needs your effort at work, at home, in your community. Would you like to know more ?

Speaker: official voice
Dialogue: Sky Marshall Dienes announces plans for an offensive against Klendathu, source of the bug meteor that destroyed Buenos Aires.

Speaker: official voice
Dialogue: We now break net and take you live to Fleet Battle Station Ticonderoga deep inside the Arachnid Quarantine Zone.

Speaker: net correspondent
Dialogue: No one here in the AQZ knows when the invasion of Kendathu will occur, but everyone's talking about it, and the talk says tomorrow !

Speaker: net correspondent
Dialogue: Here's a bunch of M.I. kids who look like they eat bugs for lunch !

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: Yum, yum yum ...!

Speaker: net correspondent
Dialogue: So you're not to worried about fighting the Arachnids...?

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Hey, shoot a nuke down a bug hole, lotta dead bugs, am I right ?

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: I just hope it's not over before we get in it !

Speaker: net correspondent
Dialogue: Some say the bugs were provoked by human attempts to colonize within the AQZ, that a "live and let live" policy is preferable to war with the bugs...

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Yeah, well, I'm from Buenos Aires, and I say kill'em all !

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: That guy's been in it.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: How can you tell ?

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: The eyes. He's got the 1000 meters stare.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Great scars.

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: I like the jewelry. Hey, amigo, where can I get an earring like yours ?

Speaker: veteran
Dialogue: Port Joe Smith, Outer Rings, Dantana... Every time I come back from a drop, my gunny gives me a bone. I got three now. You don't see a lot of guys with three.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Waht's it like... combat ?

Speaker: veteran
Dialogue: I guess it's not so bad. I mean as long as you don't get any on you.

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: Get any what on you ?

Speaker: veteran
Dialogue: Oh, you'll know when it happens. See you on the bounce.

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: I say we all go to the laser parlor and get cut together.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: What do I want with a scar ?

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: What, your skin's too pretty ? C'mon, everyone's doing it !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Carmen... ?

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Oh... at ease. Guess I oughta lose the hat when I'm off duty, eh ?

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: What happened to your hair ?

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: What do you think ? Everyone did it when we got our wings. You don't like it, do you ?

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: It's alright, I guess. You hear from anyone made it out of B.A. alive ?

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: It's funny. Sometimes I forget. Then it hits me, and I can't stop crying.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: I try just to be happy I'm still alive.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: You don't look very happy to see me.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Should I be ?

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Johnny... Life is so different from the way it was. One day you'll see what I did was best for both of us.

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Everything coposetic, Lieutenant ?

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Zander, you remember Johnny ? Zander and I are a flight team now.

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Best in the Fleet !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: I get it. This is the part that's best for both of us. Don't do me anymore favors, eh ?

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Johnny, wait...

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Forget it, Carmen. The Mobile Infantery does a thankless, dirty job, so they naturally tend to be short-tempered, thoughtless and rude.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: You got something to say about the Mobile Infantery ?

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: You heard me. Wanna make something out of it, private ?

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Not with an officer, no, sir. The M.I. doesn't mint stupid cap troopers.

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Let's disregaed rank... Everybody hear that ? Rank is not an issue here.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Zander, please... Let's go !

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: It's alright. What's he gonna do ?

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Whoa, easy there, buddy... Nice punch.

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: What's wrong with you ?

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Hey, it's just a vestigal response to procreation... bitch.

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: Forget it, Johnny. Cap Troopers and Fleet weren't meant to mix !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: It hurts...!

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: No, this hurts.

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: YAAAAAAAA !

Speaker: kitten smith
Dialogue: Well, here's to it ! We're gonna fightn, and we're gonna win !

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Mobile Infantery rules !

Speaker: johnny
Dialogue: Death to all bugs !

Speaker: dizzy
Dialogue: Don't get any on you !

Speaker: ace
Dialogue: Officer on deck !

Speaker: official voice
Dialogue: Everyday Federal scientists are looking for new ways to kill bugs and you can help...

Speaker: carl
Dialogue: To defeat the enemy, we must know the enemy. Take for instance your basic Arachnid warrior. Minimal IQ, armored, completely lethal. You can blow a limb off...

Speaker: carl
Dialogue: ... and it's still 86% combat effec-tive. But here's a tip: Aim for the nerve stem and put it down for good.

Speaker: carl
Dialogue: Now while you are out killing bugs, we want you to be our eyes and ears. The bugs use some kind of plasma burst to divert meteors and aim them toward Earth. We need to know how they do this. If you encounter any plasma, report it immediately to your superior. Good luck and good hunting !

Speaker: carmen
Dialogue: Plasma, ma'am... from the planet.

Speaker: deladier
Dialogue: Bug Batteries... According to Military Intelligence, it'll be random and light. Drop status ?

Speaker: zander
Dialogue: Drop is 35% complete, ma'am.

Speaker: deladier
Dialogue: This isn't random or light. Someone made amistake...!

Speaker: zander
